name: Yam's Projects
body:
#  Handasaim Schedule
## Overview
There was once a time when every Handasaim student had a daily struggle: having to download the schedule to their device, **everyday**. And then `luz ` was created...

>`luz` (officially: Handasaim Schedule) displays a redesigned daily schedule taken from [Handasaim](http://www.handasaim.co.il/).
The result is an re-imagined online schedule customized for each class. 
* [Go to the project](yamyam263.github.io/luz)

## Changelog
**Day 1** - Uploaded to GitHub Pages as a button to download the schedule.
**Day 2** *Changed font from Gisha to Open Sans *Maintenance fixes, enabling faster developement flow
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
